nlacp: The data in the database is analyzed according to the malaria epidemic heuristic to determine if an epidemic is occurring in the region defined by the zip code that match the first three numbers in the provided zip code (e.g. if zip code 27695 is provided, all data with zip code 276xx is analyzed, where each x is any digit from 0-9).

truth.subject: none
truth.purpose: determine if an epidemic is occurring in the region defined by the zip code that match the first three numbers in the provided zip code

pred.subject: none
pred.purpose: determine if an epidemic is occurring in the region defined by the zip code that match the first three numbers in the provided zip code
